improved: Major CSS redesign for enhanced responsiveness. The site now adapts more effectively to a range of screen sizes, including mobile devices.
Note: Some minor adjustments are still needed for smaller screens, which will be addressed in a future update when time permits.
As color selection isn't my strongest suit, feel free to open an issue or submit a pull request on GitHub if you have suggestions for improving the color scheme.
